mapper.sql: id, question, value, type, status, created_at, creator, `option`, answer_id
mapper.select: SELECT result.`option`, count(1) count FROM ( SELECT ai.*, q.order_num FROM zs_answer_item ai LEFT JOIN zs_question q ON q.id = ai.question_id WHERE ai.survey_id = #{surveyId} and question = #{qF} AND ai. STATUS = 1 and ai.creator in ( select creator from zs_answer_item where question = #{qS} and `option` = #{oS} ) )result GROUP BY result.`option` ORDER BY result.order_num

select a.seat,a.creator,a.created_at,GROUP_CONCAT(ai.question SEPARATOR '@##@') questions,GROUP_CONCAT(ai.`option` SEPARATOR '@##@') opts from zs_answer_item ai LEFT JOIN zs_answer a on a.id = ai.answer_id where a.survey_id=#{id} and ai.status = 1 group by ai.answer_id;
